messages.title: My political issues are
messages.content: My politics are generally conservative. However, my primary aim is to ensure the continued independence of my country. My secondary aim is to ensure that the country's population remains stable and proportionate to the amount of social housing and other amenities that can be provided.

keyPolicies.policyTitle: Leave the EU and regain our country's independence
keyPolicies.policyDescription: Leave the EU and regain our country's independence.
Ensure our country's population does not reach a level that adversely affects present citizens.

keyPolicies.policyTitle: YES to referendums on all major issues
keyPolicies.policyDescription: Say YES to referendums on all major issues.

keyPolicies.policyTitle: NO to wasting £45 million a day in Brussels
keyPolicies.policyDescription: Say NO to wasting £45 million a day in Brussels.

issues.brexitEurope: Leave the EU and regain our country's independence.
issues.economy: Say NO to wasting £45 million a day in Brussels.
issues.governance: Say YES to referendums on all major issues.

housing.content: Ensure our country's population does not reach a level that adversely affects present citizens.
